Reviews.Title: excellent for someone who doesn't have a tv in their room
Reviews.Author: Nathan Grose
Reviews.Content: It works perfectly, along with 0 lagging. I hooked my playstation 2 up to it, and it is slightly blurry in full screen. I can't wait to see how the ps3 looks on my laptop.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Arrive on time as was promised.  We are very happy with the quality of this purchase. It is a gift for someone - hope it works for them!

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: Harrison Nation
Reviews.Content: It's ok but for Mac you have to search up the installation guide on YouTube. It works great I just with it was compatible with HDMI cables. The graphics for the Wii recording are ok and so is the PS3 thanks to the S-Video cable but for Xbox they suck.

Reviews.Title: run away ...
Reviews.Author: Tabitha
Reviews.Content: Waste of time and money! Didn't even come with the proper equipment... once we got it working the audio sounded like we were recording a ransom call.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work with Mac .
Reviews.Author: Turik burgess
Reviews.Content: I doesn't work with Mac so it's useless to me on the web it says compatible with Mac and PC not true...

Reviews.Title: so so item
Reviews.Author: lester
Reviews.Content: Could not get the item to work properly. Very vague instructions came with it.Would not buy this item again. money poorly spent.

Reviews.Title: Its Ok
Reviews.Author: Jim Smidt
Reviews.Content: Its not the best but it gets the job done...the quality isnt that great and the audio is the same....

Reviews.Title: Do not buy
Reviews.Author: Tyler Lancaster
Reviews.Content: I literally just opened the box to find that the wrong type of splitters were sent.  I haven't even been able to test the product yet and I'm already a bit concerned.
